positive.review:
Great game, still good graphics for today, Lots of mods to choose from and each are very well made.
Gameplay is fun especially with friends and is quite a good price - I used to play this on PS4 as well, wonderful game there too highly recommend
i like playing this game because you can do things you cant do in other games like boating, camping and a lot of other stuff.
While the game does have very minor setbacks, the game itself is really well made, and it's modding community went all out with a lot of the items it has.
This game honestly just helps me relax. It's slow paced, beginner friendly, and has easy and well designed mechanics. I prefer this one over the newer ones and I would not have it any other way.
Was my very first PC game and I sunk a lot of hours into it, I have about 1000 hour's across two accounts.

Didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd sink hours into driving tractors, yet here we are. Chill loop, good machines, and that ‚Äúone more field‚Äù mindset hits harder than it should. Half the time you‚Äôre grinding crops, the other half you‚Äôre zoning out while the farm slowly becomes yours. Great if you want a slow, relaxing game that somehow eats entire evenings without trying.
Very good game I Love it its so Amazing that I Had to download it again I had it on my old pc but now I have new and I couldn't hold my self away from it

Pretty boring but it's still a good game, and people interested in farming and argiculture will definitely be interested

this game is vary good the graphics are a bit clunky the controls are ok but the expricene is amazing and the in-game mods are great id just buy the newer fs25 or fs22 all in all this game 7.5/10 DONT BUY THE DLCS!!!!!!!!!!!!! just get mods
I really like the game and all the dlcs, i just think that if you dont buy everithing together when a new one comes out, it is a bit pricey.
I love farming and rolling around with a monster truck.

this game...10/10 i was playing it like a job i enjoyed it so much i was waking up at 8am to play it. then it hit me... if i enjoy farming so much i should just go work on a farm! so i got my resumes and went to all the local farms asking if they needed a farm hand and one of then did; now for a full time job i work and maintain a farm ;) thank you farming simulator for showing me what i needed haha :) sadly wont be playing anymore though to busy on the farm now ahhaha
Farming sim is just the best game ever. It allows us to escape into a digital world where we can be creative, visualize, realize, and experience our dream lives.

Great game, still good graphics for today, Lots of mods to choose from and each are very well made.
Gameplay is fun especially with friends and is quite a good price - I used to play this on PS4 as well, wonderful game there too highly recommend
this is a fun game that i have played for 600 hours on and its just farming on the computer so i would check it out
i like playing this game because you can do things you cant do in other games like boating, camping and a lot of other stuff.
While the game does have very minor setbacks, the game itself is really well made, and it's modding community went all out with a lot of the items it has.
This game honestly just helps me relax. It's slow paced, beginner friendly, and has easy and well designed mechanics. I prefer this one over the newer ones and I would not have it any other way.
Was my very first PC game and I sunk a lot of hours into it, I have about 1000 hour's across two accounts.

I really do suggest this game I have not got bored in the 150 hours that I have played like even once! If you don't want to worry about money then download a mod that gives you a lot of money! You can add a LOT to this game for completely FREE with mods, there are a lot of mods including cars, trucks, farming equipment, houses, sheds, maps etc!
This is not a boring game.   Learning real world understanding of the farming world.

I loved the game, third best in the series next to FS22 and FS25! My only complaint is I wish there were more non-mod maps. Would recommend to anyone who has failed at becoming a landowner in real-life. It makes you feel important pretending to be Big Time!

Didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd sink hours into driving tractors, yet here we are. Chill loop, good machines, and that ‚Äúone more field‚Äù mindset hits harder than it should. Half the time you‚Äôre grinding crops, the other half you‚Äôre zoning out while the farm slowly becomes yours. Great if you want a slow, relaxing game that somehow eats entire evenings without trying.

farming sim 19 is the best farming sim that was made the others are just ass i would defo recommend this to new players of farming sim because it is affordable on steam unlike the others and it has a ton of mods you can download for free i love farming sim 19
genuinly still an amazing game, just buy it already its way more fun then it looks like
If you ever wanted to live by your own in a small village, growing your own crops or animals, then this game is for you. Can be buggy though.
Great modding community and fan base. Worth the money for what you get.

negative.review: Too stupid to enjoy, what's the deal with salt shakers anyways
they make a new one every 3 years. its like cod but even more boring. its just minimum wage simulator
I dont like farming - if I did I rather do it IRL than a game...
I've been playing this game for many years until the problem of not being able to play multiplayer with friends appeared, I haven't played it since then and that's why I don't like it.
dont like beacuse i have pc over 1000$ and i still have 40 fps that is not normal for the game in 2019......
